text: Columbia Records is an American record label formed in 1888. It is the oldest existing record company in the world. Its parent company is now Sony Music Entertainment. Over the years, some of the artists and bands that have been signed to the label include Aretha Franklin, System of a Down, Johnny Cash, Bob Dylan, Bela Fleck, Janis Joplin, Paul McCartney, John Lennon, Prince, Willie Nelson, Dolly Parton, and hundreds of other artists. ==Related pages== * List of Columbia Records artists ==References== Category:American record labels Category:1888 establishments in the United States Category:1938 establishments in the United States Category:1991 disestablishments in the United States Category:Sony Category:Columbia Broadcasting System Category:Viacom
title: Columbia Records
